dateRender.description: custom rendering function for date cells by setting a scoped slot

disabled.description: determine whether the DatePicker is disabled

disabledDate.description: specify the date that cannot be selected

getCalendarContainer.description: to set the container of the floating layer, while the default is to create a div element in body

popupStyle.description: to customize the style of the popup calendar

dropdownClassName.description: to customize the className of the popup calendar

size.description: determine the size of the input box, the height of large and small, are 40px and 24px respectively, while default size is 32px
